person.persName: Morton M. Price (Irvine, Kentucky, jailor, deputy marshal, and county clerk)

body.p: Irvine, Kentucky, jailor, deputy marshal, and county clerk. Kentucky native. Married to Francis Price. Father of Emma Price, Taylor Price, Edwin Price, Mary Price, and Joseph Price. Jailor of Estill County in 1850. Deputy marshal in Estill County for the Census of the United States in 1850. County commissioner in Estill County in 1860. Hired two enslaved persons in 1860. County clerk of Estill County from 1862 to 1866.
